attributes.action: Stop loud back ground music on TV programmes
attributes.additional_details:
back ground music on TV programmes are too loud and you can not hear any words that are being spoken.
thhere  shoulod be a cut out button, like the one used for deaf people that lets them use "Subtitles at the bottom of the page. Surely a button could be made thaat allows you to listen with te loud musicof cuut it out alltogether.
